cleaned_text: This special kit was curated to assist you in clearing mind, body, spirit, and home. Use kit for 30 days for lasting results. Contains the following: Healing Oil - For outer healing. Nourishing, effective oil that balances all skin types - from acne prone, dry, oily, sun damaged, inflamed skin. Also effective for cuts, burns, scrapes, and dry irritated skin. We call this the Miracle oil as it's healing properties are truly remarkable.*Packaged in a patented European made ultraviolet glass to filter out light and preserve product ingredients. Soul Revival 6th Chakra Spray - Use to assist with mental clarity, focus, build connection to intuition and higher knowing. Spray over aura or in atmosphere for space clearing. Sacred White Sage - Use to clear out old or lower vibrational energies. Sweep over body for clearing and throughout the home to revitalize energy. Selenite Wand - Used for good luck, focus and protection. Selenite is known for its soothing and calming properties as it evokes a feeling of deep tranquility and peace. Hold wand, set a positive intention for yourself or place on body when needing healing.($115 value)
